[[index]]

Website
-------
jrnl.sh


Cheat Sheet
-----------

New Entry:

jrnl [day] [time]: [Entry] - You can also add a '*' before ':' to favorite the entry.

Tags are supported with '@' - ie 'Went to the @beach'

Viewing Entries:

View All - jrnl -to today
Recent - jrnl -[number of entries]
Date Range - jrnl -from "when" -to "when"
Specific Dat - jrnl -on [day]
By word - jrnl -contains "word" (you can add --edit at the end to open them in your editor)
By Tag - jrnl @[tag] (you can enter multiple)
See Tags - jrnl --tags
See Stars - jrnl -starred

You can make multiple different journals by specifying them after calling jrnl
ie - jrnl work [entry]

Deleting: just add --delete
